message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $14,000. I think it would be a valuable addition to your inventory and I'm confident you'll be happy with the purchase.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to $13,500. This product is truly valuable and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I understand you're looking for a price closer to $13,500, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. Would you be willing to accept this price?
